Protean.description: +1 Power and +2 Obscurity in forests or wild hexes

Obtenebration.description: +1 Power in urban or shadowed hexes

Stone Sentinel.description: +1 Toughness fighting in urban hexes. -1 Movement. Can’t activate events.

Cover Story.description: Prevent 1 Masquerade loss from an adjacent battle

Premonition.description: Scout 2 from an allied unit not of your choosing.

Animal.description: +1 Movement, -1 Obscurity when attacking an urban hex. Can’t activate events.

Obfuscate.description: Unit will remain invisible unless ordered to attack during a move action.

Herd.description: If unit is on an urban field, use 1 action to add 2 blood to the blood pool.

Blood Money.description: Unit costs an additional blood to activate.

Sabotage.description: Use 1 action to give enemy unit -2 to all stats for the rest of the turn.

Red Salve.description: Use 1 action to heal 2 Health of an adjacent unit.

Seer Ritual.description: Use 1 action and 1 blood to see any one square on the map for the rest of the turn.

Villagers.description: +1 to all stats when on an urban field.

Road-Wardens.description: +1 Toughness and Revelation when on a road field.

Cavalry.description: +1 Power when on a plains field.

Truefaith.description: +1 to all stats when fighting a Vampire.

Holy.description: Cannot take damage while the Holy Shield is up.

Feral.description: +2 Power and Toughness in wild / forest terrain.
